name: Cubie
description: Cubie is a Radiant of SEED. As her family runs a dating agency, she has a way with making relationships work. Even Nightmares can be her clients.

passiveSkill.name: Together Forever
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "If Cubie hits exactly 2 enemies with each arrow, the two will fall in love and be stunned for 1 round. In addition, the DMG will be increased by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Great Honor
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Cubie fills the air with romance and shoots an arrow at each column of enemies, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage."}

specialSkill.name: Heart Arrow
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Cubie shoots a love arrow, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Single Strike
normalSkill.description: Deals {placeholder} of ATK damage to an enemy.

templateData.lens4.skill: Cubie fills the air with romance and shoots an arrow at each column of enemies, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage.
templateData.lens5.skill: If Cubie hits exactly 2 enemies with each arrow, the two will fall in love and be stunned for 1 round. In addition, the DMG will be increased by {placeholder}.
